results.name: Decimal expansion of Compton wavelength in meters.
comment: Or decimal expansion of electron Compton wavelength in meters.

Also decimal expansion of the relativistic de Broglie wavelength of an electron whose velocity is equal to c/sqrt(2), where c is the speed of light in vacuum in SI units. For more information see A229962.
The Compton wavelength is the wavelength of a photon whose energy is the same as the rest energy of an electron. - _Omar E. Pol_, Dec 03 2013
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Nov 12 2013
